name: Masnun Siam
aboutDescription: Hello, I'm Masnun Siam – a dedicated full-time Flutter developer with a rich 3-year experience under my belt. I've had the privilege of working on approximately 40 different applications, ranging from crafting new ones to refining existing ones. Learning is my passion, and I'm constantly seeking opportunities to expand my skills and knowledge within the Flutter ecosystem. It's an exciting journey, and I'm here to make the most out of it.

experiences.description: At Binary Fusion, I held a significant role in maintaining and optimizing large-scale applications, collaborating seamlessly within a team. As a key contributor, I played a vital part in ensuring the smooth operation of intricate cross-platform apps, including the implementation of critical Firebase services for enhanced functionality. Moreover, I successfully managed the deployment of these applications to both the App Store and Google Play Store, highlighting my capacity to see projects through to completion. This experience underscored my aptitude for teamwork and showcased my expertise in efficiently managing and enhancing complex app ecosystems.

As the sole app developer at Roxarth Manhattan, I played a pivotal role in the creation and maintenance of cross-platform applications. My responsibilities encompassed UI/UX design, REST API integration, deployment on app stores, and even venturing into blockchain and Ethereum network exploration for decentralized applications. This experience underscored my proficiency in delivering end-to-end solutions and my ability to adapt and excel in a dynamic environment.

projects.name: Portfolio
projects.description:
Yes, it's THIS portfolio! 
This project follows a Riverpod-based Architecture, using a feature-first approach for its structure. It is fully responsive, and supports multiple themes.

projects.name: Dosh Eats
projects.description: A Food delivery app built with Flutter and Firebase. It supports multiple restaurants, and features a cart system, order tracking, and a user-friendly interface. It comes with 3 apps: one for the customer, one for the restaurant, and one for the delivery person.

projects.name: Dosh Network
projects.description: This is a video streaming app built with Flutter. It works with API provided from a wordpress website. It supports multiple categories, and features a user-friendly interface.
